Best Places to Prank Call
Published by Littlekid137 in Pranks June 1st, 2009
This is my second prank call article about places to prank call. Great laughs!
Ultimate Prank Click Here
My first article was published about 3 months ago now I want to do a new one!
USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
First article
Any Pizza Joint
This is my new favorite. Order a lot of pizzas lets say 10 get different toppings on each and tell them to deliver it. Give them an address of someone who you don’t like so much or simply a random address. I’d call with *67 which blocks the number before doing this.
Not a call but
Go to McDonalds or some fast food restaurant during it’s busy hours. Make a very very big complicated order. Just on a side note: unless you don’t want to loose money in this process go to a drive thru with just one window where you pay and get your food. Pull up to the window and wait a bit like your fumbling finding money. After a bit (the food should be ready) just drive off.
Target
Ask if they have any wii’s most likely they will say yes, then ask what colors they have. Then say you want a rainbow one and just yell and scream until he hangs up or something else happens.
Car Dealership
Ask for a hover car. They will say they haven’t invented them yet. Tell them that they are fat for not inventing it. Hang up and recall on a different phone and use a different accent. Use as many times as you like. Share this on Linkedin Seed this on Newsvine Share this on Devmarks Add this to Google Bookmarks Add this to Mister Wong Add this to Izeby Share this on Tumblr Share this on Tipd Share this on PFBuzz 4 Comments Cathy Saunders Posted June 1, 2009 at 9:07 am I thought the whole thing was funny. I was laughing hysterically about McDonalds! Resounding Glass Posted June 1, 2009 at 6:59 pm haha nice. off to read the first one now.
Just as a piece of advice I found it usually helps to space out publishing your articles as too many articles all at once will overwhelm your readers which will result in less hits for you.
Hope you got my message earlier and I can’t wait to hear back from you.
-Resounding Glass
Resounding Glass Posted June 1, 2009 at 7:04 pm By the way, nice job on making the front page of purple slinky.
Sorry for the double post.
-Resounding Glass adam Posted July 2, 2009 at 10:15 am walmart is the bomb for prank calling. start out like its a serious call then start yelling or something
